#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

typedef vector<int> vi;

#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i = a; i < b; ++i)

vi mem;

int segt(int n){
  if (mem[n] != -1) return mem[n];
  if (n == 1) return mem[n] = 1;
  return mem[n] = 1 + segt(n/2) + segt(n - n/2);
}

int main(){
  int T;
  cin >> T;
  while(T--){
    long long n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << 2 * n - 1 << endl; 
  }
}
